nodes.text: Steward Lee is a veteran television animator who served as the longest-running episodic director of the animated television series Star Wars: The Clone Wars. Together with brother Steven G. Lee, Steward returned as episodic director for the animated series Star Wars Rebels. He also directed on Star Wars Resistance.
Lee also worked in the animation departments for Back to the Future: The Animated Series (1991) and The Batman (2005–2006).
